Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.15-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-21698 affecting package node-problem-detector for versions less than 0.8.15-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package node-problem-detector is earlier than 0.8.15-1, affected by CVE-2022-21698
